name: NeatSmart
0:
”Alexa, open Neat Smart”
”Alexa, ask Neat Smart to set away mode”
”Alexa, ask Neat Smart to set boost mode”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: neat smart
des:
This skill requires a Neat Gadget. For more information or to purchase one of our gadgets, please visit www.neatsmart.tech. 
Neat Gadgets Quick Setup:
http://neatsmart.tech/support/quick-setup/

Currently available gadgets:
- Neat Smart Air Freshener

Neat Smart Air Freshener Description:

· Purchase at https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0817V3DKF
· Smart air freshener dispenser brings continuous and long-lasting fragrance into your home
· Works with Alexa as an Alexa Gadget.
· Over the voice setup. Initial setup completed with two queries from Alexa.
· Set your desired spray interval.
· Enable away and flagrance boost mode.
· More info at http://neatsmart.tech/products/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
